parameters.name: DestinationSnapshotDescription
parameters.description: The description of the snapshot. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: DestinationSnapshotName
parameters.description: The name of the snapshot. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the source snapshot.
